1: לֵ֣ץ <sup>3887 </sup> <n>[is] a mocker</n> הַ֭יַּין <sup>3196 </sup> <n>Wine</n> הֹמֶ֣ה <sup>1993 </sup> <n>[is] raging</n> שֵׁכָ֑ר <sup>7941 </sup> <n>strong drink</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and whoever</n> שֹׁ֥גֶה <sup>7686 </sup> <n>and whosoever is deceived</n> בּ֝֗וֹ לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>is not</n> יֶחְכָּֽם׃ <sup>2449 </sup> <n>thereby is not wise</n>
2: נַ֣הַם <sup>5099 </sup> <n>[is] as the roaring</n> כַּ֭כְּפִיר <sup>3715 </sup> <n>of a lion</n> אֵ֣ימַת <sup>367 </sup> <n>The fear</n> מֶ֑לֶךְ <sup>4428 </sup> <n>of a king</n> מִ֝תְעַבְּר֗וֹ <sup>5674 </sup> <n>[whoso] provoketh him to anger</n> חוֹטֵ֥א <sup>2398 </sup> <n>sinneth</n> נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>[against] his own soul</n>

4: מֵ֭חֹרֶף <sup>2779 </sup> <n>by reason of the cold</n> עָצֵ֣ל <sup>6102 </sup> <n>The sluggard</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>does not</n> יַחֲרֹ֑שׁ <sup>2790 </sup> <n>will not plow</n> [יִשְׁאַל כ] (וְשָׁאַ֖ל <sup>7592 </sup> <n>ask counsel</n> ק) בַּקָּצִ֣יר <sup>7105 </sup> <n>in harvest</n> וָאָֽיִן׃ <sup>369 </sup> <n>and has</n>
